Start - Coming Soon Responsive Template

Documentation

Which code editor for editing files ?

You can use sublime text 3 for editing the code.
Download link : http://www.sublimetext.com/3

How to change logo?

Open the image folder and replace the logo.png image with your logo. For retina support change the logo@2x.png, this image should be twice the size of the non retina image.
 
 
Open the index.html file in your code editor. 
Go to line no 23 and edit the site description (alt tag ).

How to change Background image?

To change the image go to img folder and replace bg.jpg

How to change Background slideshow images?

To change the images go to img folder and replace the images which are named as bg-1.png, bg-2.png, bg-3.png

How to integrate your mailchimp to subscribe form?

 
Open the index.html file in your code editor.
 
Go to line no 52, changes needs to be made here ::: action="http://csmthemes.us3.list-manage.com/subscribe/post-json?u=9666c25a337f497687875a388&amp;id=5b881a50fb&amp;c=?"
 
Visit mailchimp knowledge base http://kb.mailchimp.com/article/can-i-host-my-own-sign-up-forms/
 
I made a video tutorial for easy understanding.
Download it here :  https://www.dropbox.com/s/pnmwyu2zybkzlq4/mailchimp.mp4
 
 
You need to change three value
http://csmthemes.us3.list-manage.com/subscribe/
u=9666c25a337f497687875a388
id=5b881a50fb

How to change welcome message?

 
Open the index.html file in your code editor. 
 
Go to line no 44.
Put every rotating words inside the <span class="rotate"></span> and separate it with a comma and the script will automatically cycle through each words in order.

How to change countdown timer?

Open main.js in the js folder.

Go to line no 70 and change the timer. Format of time is m/d/y.

How to get the contact form working?

Go to php folder, inside the php folder open contact-me.php file in your code editor.
Go to line no 3 and change the email address to your email address.
IMPORTANT: Use a domain email to recieve mails, it won't work with any other email address. Example, if your domain is abc.com your email address will be name@abc.com

How to Edit the map?

Go to js folder and open the gmaps.js file in your code editor. 
 
change coordinates on line number 1.
change zoom on line number 7
change title on line number 18
Map can be found at https://www.google.com/maps/
 
 

How to change Twitter feed?

 

Step 1

Open the main.js file in your code editor. 
 
Go to line no 49.
Change envatomarket to your username.

Step 2

 
 
 
First, you need a consumer key and secret keys. Get one from https://dev.twitter.com/apps
 
Edit api/config.php file and replace variables with your Consumer and oAuth Keys. 
    // Consumer Key
    define('CONSUMER_KEY', 'CONSUMER_KEY_HERE');
    define('CONSUMER_SECRET', 'CONSUMER_SECRET_HERE');

    // User Access Token
    define('ACCESS_TOKEN', 'ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE');
    define('ACCESS_SECRET', 'ACCESS_SECRET_HERE');
Plugin doc https://github.com/sonnyt/Tweetie
 
You need a webhost for this to work.

How to change social media?

 
Open the index.html file in your code editor.
 
Social media links can be changed on line no 31
 
Change the value of href { change the # to say https://twitter.com/name } to correspond to the social media name.
 
Done.
 
 
 
Add more icons if needed optional
 
You can add more social media links if you want.
 
More such icon can be got from font awesome. http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/
 
Go down to brand icons and select any one of the icon from the set, click on one of them say for example linkedin-square http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icon/linkedin-square/ 
 
Add another line of code after line no 33 in index.html , which should look like this 
 
<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-linkedin-square"></i></a></li>
 
You can add as many icons you need.
